Fixed to correctly find file references specified in Product_Document products.

Added a file reference validator that performs the following checks: Validate that the casing specified in the label matches the casing on the file system and validate that the generated checksums match the checksums specified in the label, if provided.
Added a DocumentValidator class that provides an extension point to the library to perform validation on parsed PDS4 labels.
Bundled in DTD for 1.1 catalog. This allows doctypes to be specified in catalog files.
